Key Match Events: The Utah Jazz dropped the first game of 2024-25, falling at Delta Center to the Memphis Grizzlies 126-124.
Pre-Game Insights: The Jazz enter the season with a new look after finishing 12th in the Western Conference last season with a 31-51 record.
Others: The article discusses the new players and veterans in the Utah Jazz team, including Lauri Markkanen, Jordan Clarkson, John Collins, Collin Sexton, Walker Kessler, Johnny Juzang, Keyonte George, Taylor Hendricks, Brice Sensabaugh, Svi Mykhailiuk, Drew Eubanks, and Patty Mills.
